Title: Episode 5
Plot:
Starts with "Bit by Bit".  Dorothy visits a Ballet Class, Captain predicts it's raining umbrellas.  The mascots play croquet, and Anthony's Workshop the kids are making things out of dough.  

Song List:
"Bit by Bit"
"Toot Toot"
"Let's have a barbie on the beach"
"Haba Naba Nuwe"
"Rolling down the sandhills / 
Running up the sandhills"
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
